title: Drawing, September 11, 1934
medium: Graphite, yellow crayon on tracing paper
markings: Stamped in black ink, lower right:  ROUGH SKETCH/RETURN TO/HENRY DRYFUSS 501 MADISON AVENUE, N.Y.C.; lower left:  DRAWING NO./DATE
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower left, with drawing no.: 61; date, lower left:  9/11/34; lower right corner:  X
creditline: Gift of Industrial Designers Society of America
description: Horizontal metal piece, viewed in perspective, with trough in middle and with circular cut outs along left edge (to hold toothbrushes), secured in wall mount.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, September 11, 1934.
September 11, 1934. Graphite, yellow crayon on tracing paper. Gift of Industrial Designers Society of America. 2000-11-3.
